a.style: font-family:"Playfair Display", Georgia, "Times New Roman", serif

text.tspan: PISA average mathematics score, male vs female, 2015
Average score of 15-year-old male and female students on the PISA mathematics scale. The metric for the overall
mathematics scale is based on a mean for OECD countries of 500 points and a standard deviation of 100 points.
PISA: Mean performance on the mathematics scale. Female
PISA: Mean performance on the mathematics scale. Male
Source: OECD Programme for International Student Assessment (PISA)
